title: Add uploaded photos to the Valentine’s website gallery

requirements.text: Add the two user-uploaded images ("Messenger_creation_358DDD99-4DC4-4B99-9AB8-F8F5604864CA.jpeg" and "Messenger_creation_358DDD99-4DC4-4B99-9AB8-F8F5604864CA-1.jpeg") to the website by including them as additional items in the existing romantic photo gallery (the "Our Beautiful Moments" section).
acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded image files are added to the frontend as static assets and are accessible via stable URLs at runtime (no broken images in production build).
The gallery in frontend/src/components/sections/GallerySection.tsx includes new entries for both uploaded images and renders them using the existing FramedGalleryImage component.
The new gallery items have English alt text (e.g., “Our beautiful moment” / “A special memory”) and do not break the responsive grid layout on mobile and desktop.
No changes are required to the backend; the site continues to function as a static single-page experience with the new images displayed.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not modify immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep the backend as a single-actor Motoko canister; no backend work is needed for this change.
nonGoals: Adding new sections or changing the overall site structure beyond inserting the uploaded photos into the existing gallery.
Implementing uploads, image editing, or a CMS/admin interface for managing gallery images.
